commit message:
Merge pull request #23 from rwetzlmayr/l10n-de

L10n de for 4.1.6

Changes to ok/cancel to match android standards

BC was consistent in OK/Cancel placement, but precisely opposite to the
recent Android guidelines (and existing android apps).

Now, 'Save'/'Ok'/'Yes' is on the RHS and 'Cancel' etc on the LHS.

This was causing confusion for camera users.

Reorganized code into more packages

- moved utilities to utils
- widgets to widgets
Code cleanup to remove more lint warnings

Fix bug on rotating ISBN search and NPE

Search ID was not being restored after rotation.

OnActivityResult is called *before* onResume(), so TaskManager was also
not restored in some cases. The instance variable mTaskManager is now
private and getTaskManager() handles creation as necessary.
Fix button positions on 'dup book' dialogs

Use ONE database instance for all activities and wait longer for access

Due to the 'database locked' errors, CatalogueDBAdapter now uses one
shared database connection.
Prevent re-delivery of some messages (specifically, search results)
